query:
ALTER TABLE users 
MODIFY COLUMN openId VARCHAR(64) UNIQUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS passwordHash VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resetToken VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resetTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP;
